home.whatIsBeaverDesc: Beaver Finance is a Single-Asset Intelligent Yield Farming platform that is the first in DeFi to integrate Liquidity Mining with the Option-based cutting-edge hedging solution for Impermanent Loss.
home.adDesc1: Under a single-asset staking mode, Asset Allocation & Pairing algorithms between multiple capital pools realize return rates comparable to dual-asset yield farming scenarios.
home.adDesc2: After the 1:1 asset pairing process, operations like dual-asset supplying, LP token staking, yield withdrawal, opening, & closing positions are all automatically exercised by smart contracts.
home.adDesc3: Beaver hedges Impermanent Loss from liquidity mining through a set of European Option Portfolio supported by Asteria Finance Lab.
home.howToJoin: How can I become a Beaver?
home.howToJoinDesc: Two types of Beaver: Liquidity Providers and Impermanent Loss Hedger
home.role1Desc: Beaver Finance would support asset-pairs with high yields and a level of safety on major DEXs. Users can choose any asset pairs and deposit either one into Beaver LP pools and leave the rest of operations for the platform to automatically exercise.
home.role2Desc: The capital of ILH pools are used to hedge possible Impermanent Loss of LP mining positions. Assets of hedgers are guaranteed LOSSLESS with additional rewards.
home.getStartedDesc: Join Beaver Finace for the ultimate experience of Lossless yield farming
